title: Verdi d'indivia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Vegetarian restaurant opened February 2014. Serves pasta, lasagna, risotto and other savory dishes. Also has muffins, cakes and soy yogurt with fresh fruit and cereals. Juices and smoothies made-to-order. Fresh and youthful atmosphere. Free Wi-Fi.
